trans-unit.source: Provides properties that are used with the following events in the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece propriedades que são utilizadas com os seguintes eventos na raiz <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objeto: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CursorEventArgs class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: A classe de CursorEventArgs está exposta como o `e` parâmetro o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: This class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe contém as seguintes propriedades:-a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade, o que é utilizada para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objeto que o evento foi gerado for.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property gets the name of the chart area; other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>propriedade obtém o nome da área de gráfico; também podem ser definidas outras propriedades da área de gráfico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>propriedade, o que é utilizada para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objeto que o evento foi gerado for.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Determinar o tipo de eixo-X, X2, Y ou Y2 — utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Também é possível definir outras propriedades do eixo.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the position of a cursor along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>propriedade, o que representa a posição de um cursor ao longo de um eixo, medida como um valor de eixo, durante o evento foi gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property can be used to get the position of a cursor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>propriedade pode ser utilizada para obter a posição de um cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>eventos, também é possível utilizar esta propriedade para repor a posição do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A> property, which represents the starting position of a range selection along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>propriedade, o que representa a posição inicial de uma seleção de intervalo ao longo de um eixo, medida como um valor de eixo, durante o evento foi gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A> property can be used to get the selected range start position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>propriedade pode ser utilizada para obter a posição de início do intervalo selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the position.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>eventos, também é possível utilizar esta propriedade para repor a posição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A> property, which represents the end position of a range selection along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>propriedade, o que representa a posição final de uma seleção de intervalo ao longo de um eixo, medida como um valor de eixo, durante o evento foi gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A> property can be used to get the selected range end position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>propriedade pode ser utilizada para obter a posição final do intervalo selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the position.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>eventos, também é possível utilizar esta propriedade para repor a posição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified chart area, axis, and cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs"> </xref> classe com a área de gráfico especificado, o eixo e a posição do cursor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> o cursor.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: O eixo do cursor.

trans-unit.source: The new cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Nova posição do cursor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified chart area, axis, start and end positions for the new range.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs"> </xref> classe com as posições de área, eixo, início e fim de gráfico especificado para o intervalo de novo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> o cursor.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: O eixo do cursor.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new range selection.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial da seleção de intervalo novo.

trans-unit.source: The end position of the new range selection.
trans-unit.target: A posição final da nova seleção de intervalo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto uma seleção de cursor ou intervalo pertence.

trans-unit.source: The Axis property is exposed in the following events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de eixo é exposta nos seguintes eventos de raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizada para:-determinam o tipo de eixo-X, X2, Y ou Y2 — que o evento está a ser gerado, utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -obter e definir as propriedades do eixo, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto que representa o eixo que uma seleção de cursor ou intervalo pertence.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto uma seleção de cursor ou intervalo pertence.

trans-unit.source: The ChartArea property is exposed in the following events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ChartArea está exposta nos seguintes eventos de raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - determine which chart area the event is being raised for; this is useful to know when there are multiple chart areas within a chart image.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser utilizada para:-determinar qual o evento que está a ser gerado para; de área de gráfico Isto é útil para saber quando existem várias áreas de gráfico dentro de uma imagem do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: - get and set chart area properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -obter e definir propriedades de área de gráfico, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> that represents the chart area that a range selection or cursor belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> que representa a área de gráfico a que uma seleção contínua ou o cursor pertence.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of a cursor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição de um cursor.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the cursor's position.
trans-unit.target: Consoante o evento, também define a posição do cursor.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa a nova posição de um cursor e podem ser utilizada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>eventos para obter a posição do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser utilizado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>eventos para definir a posição do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que definir esta propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>evento não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade NewPosition terá um valor de <xref:System.Double.NaN>neste evento.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a área de gráfico a que o evento que está a ser gerado para, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>propriedade para determinar se este posição final para um intervalo selecionado ao longo do primário ou secundário X ou o eixo Y.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a cursor along an axis.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição de um cursor ao longo de um eixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição final de um intervalo selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the end position of the range.
trans-unit.target: Consoante o evento, também define a posição final do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The NewSelectionEnd property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade NewSelectionEnd representa a nova posição de um cursor e podem ser utilizada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>eventos para obter a posição do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser utilizado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>eventos para definir a posição do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que definir esta propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>evento não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewSelectionEnd property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade NewSelectionEnd terá um valor de <xref:System.Double.NaN>neste evento.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: The start position of a selected range is not necessarily less than the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial de um intervalo selecionado não é necessariamente menor que a posição final de um intervalo selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The start position is the position where the user fist clicked within the chart area, and the end position is the position of the mouse at the time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial é a posição em que fist o utilizador clica na área de gráfico, e a posição final é a posição do rato no momento que do evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a área do gráfico que o evento está a ser gerado para utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>propriedade para determinar se este posição final para um intervalo selecionado ao longo do primário ou secundário X ou o eixo Y.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição final de um intervalo selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição inicial de um intervalo selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the start position of the range.
trans-unit.target: Consoante o evento, também define a posição de início do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The NewSelectionStart property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade NewSelectionStart representa a nova posição de um cursor e podem ser utilizada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>eventos para obter a posição do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser utilizado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>eventos para definir a posição do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event will have no effect; the NewSelectionStart property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que definir esta propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>evento não tem qualquer efeito; a propriedade NewSelectionStart terá um valor de <xref:System.Double.NaN>neste evento.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: The start position of a selected range is not necessarily less than the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial de um intervalo selecionado não é necessariamente menor que a posição final de um intervalo selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The start position is the position where the user fist clicked within the chart area, and the end position is the position of the mouse at the time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial é a posição em que fist o utilizador clica na área de gráfico, e a posição final é a posição do rato no momento que do evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a área de gráfico a que o evento que está a ser gerado para, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>propriedade para determinar se este posição final para um intervalo selecionado ao longo do primário ou secundário X ou o eixo Y.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the start position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição inicial de um intervalo selecionado.
